title: Agent Reyes Closes In
location: SETI Institute, then Recursionist safe house in San Jose
key_scenes: Government raid on SETI with false fire alarm
Elliot meets Agent Maya Reyes for first time
First critical decision point - Elliot chooses to flee
Safe house reveal and operational center
Phone call with Cassandra confirming her involvement
Learning about Reyes' background and Temporal Anomalies Division
revelations: Temporal Anomalies Division is real government agency
Government has been tracking Elliot since he accessed signal
First critical decision point executed correctly
Government wants to weaponize temporal technology
Reyes' division formed after classified quantum experiment went wrong
Reyes has personal stake involving temporal mechanics
Cassandra was always part of Recursionists' plan
Device construction can begin with full team assembled
planted_elements: Reyes knowing Elliot would run (she's seen models too)
Government has own probability analysts and models
Multiple future intersections between Elliot and Reyes predicted
Gaps in probability clouds representing freedom within determinism

Elliot_Cross.emotional_state: Adrenaline-fueled, committed, exhausted, seeking freedom in gaps
Elliot_Cross.knowledge: Now fugitive, understands government threat, first decision point passed

Agent_Maya_Reyes.emotional_state: Professional, calm, unsurprised by Elliot's actions
Agent_Maya_Reyes.knowledge: Has access to probability models, knows this is more than fugitive case

Cassandra_Wright.knowledge: Now full partner in timeline mission

themes_explored: First major choice within deterministic framework
Becoming fugitive in service of larger timeline
Free will as finding gaps in probability
atmosphere: Dawn raid tension, fugitive chase, underground resistance, noir paranoia escalating
foreshadowing: Some encounters end in violence (alley shooting)
Reyes has personal motivation beyond duty
Government weaponization leads to extinction in some timelines
Timeline has three months until device completion
temporal_mechanics_established: Critical decision points are real and observable
Government has competing probability models and analysts
Timeline branches based on capture vs. escape
Correct choices can be mathematically predicted
next_chapter_hooks: What happened in Reyes' quantum experiment?
Will Cassandra adapt to fugitive life?
How will Reyes track them next?
Can they build the device before recapture?
What are the gaps in probability that offer true freedom?
